channel.title: Updates from Opening the Budget
channel.subtitle:
Opening the Israeli Government Budget, one Shekel at a time
New transfer of 5 Million Shekels http://the.open-budget.org.il/00203040 5 Millions Shekels were transferred to the cow and sheep department transfer,00203040,agriculture 32.1,34.8 Tue, 18 Aug 2014 15:10:35 +0000
